Posted By: Ragamander (10/25/2009 8:41:35 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
[Conspiracy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Conspiracy) + [Sporoloth Ancient](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sporoloth Ancient) + [Sporesower Thallid](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sporesower Thallid) and you have a growing army of fungus that creates more of itself, constantly. Use with [Doubling Season](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doubling Season) for added effect. Just make sure to declare that all of your creatures are to become Fungi; essentially, your Saprolings will create more Saprolings.  
  
[Conspiracy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Conspiracy) + [Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero) + literally any creature with trample, haste, and a nice hefty attack power. You can pull out [Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero) (or if [Conspiracy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Conspiracy) is in play anything) with [Amrou Scout](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Amrou Scout)s, [Blightspeaker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blightspeaker)s, [Defiant Falcon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Defiant Falcon)s, [Defiant Vanguard](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Defiant Vanguard)s, [Ramosian Captain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ramosian Captain)s, [Ramosian Lieutenant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ramosian Lieutenant)s, [Ramosian Sergent](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ramosian Sergent)s, or [Ramosian Sky Marshal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ramosian Sky Marshal)s. Really... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
Conspiracy + Sporoloth Ancient + Sporesower Thallid and you have a growing army of fungus that creates more of itself, constantly. Use with Doubling Season for added effect. Just make sure to declare that all of your creatures are to become Fungi; essentially, your Saprolings will create more Saprolings.

Conspiracy + Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero + literally any creature with trample, haste, and a nice hefty attack power. You can pull out Lin Sivvi, Defiant Hero (or if Conspiracy is in play anything) with Amrou Scouts, Blightspeakers, Defiant Falcons, Defiant Vanguards, Ramosian Captains, Ramosian Lieutenants, Ramosian Sergents, or Ramosian Sky Marshals. Really... (see all)
